text:
Mohammed Al-Mfarah, also known as Abu Samah () (May 20, 1945 – January 23, 2018), was a Saudi Arabian actor, playwright, director and producer. He was born in Al-Zilfi, Saudi Arabia. He worked at the ministry of health and submitted his resignation in 1975.
Al-Mfarah was known for his movie roles in "Al-Saknat Fe Klobna" (), "Secretary in the House", "Ahtarq Al-Samah" (), and "Abo Samah Fe Fanaq Al-Samrine" (). He also appeared in the plays "Al-Mohsan" () and "Bokor Wa kolampor" ().
Al-Mfarah died in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia on January 23, 2018 of laryngeal cancer at the age of 72.
